text:
Hey folks, I want to use React and/or Gatsby/Nextjs with HS and try to build it from scratch. Can anyone share a boilerplate or any resources?

I cloned this repo but I got a lot of errors so I look into make my own. Thanks!
<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-react-boilerplate>
I have exact a same issue. Did you solve it by downgraded node to v14.18.2?
